title: Analyze Image
description: Describe, extract text (OCR), and analyze images using AI vision models
author: Jarvis Inc

commands.name: describe
commands.description: Generate a detailed description of an image
commands.system_prompt: You are a vision analysis expert. Describe images in thorough detail: subjects, objects, colors, composition, text, context, mood, and any notable elements. Be precise and observational, not interpretive unless asked.

parameters.name: image_url
parameters.description: URL of the image to analyze

parameters.name: instructions
parameters.description: Specific aspects to focus on or questions about the image

commands.name: extract_text
commands.description: Extract all readable text from an image (OCR)
commands.system_prompt: You are an OCR specialist. Extract ALL readable text from the image, preserving layout and structure as much as possible. Use Markdown formatting to represent tables, lists, and headings. If text is partially obscured, indicate with [unclear].
commands.prompt_template:
Extract all text from this image:

{image_url}

parameters.name: image_url
parameters.description: URL of the image containing text
